hotel_name: Radisson Blu Plaza Bangkok (SHA Plus+)
title: Cheap 5 starsβ€
content:
It is very cheap cause it is 5 stars hotel. Location is good, close to asok bts. Nice transportation but heavy traffic. 
Room looks quite clean, but never use electronic kettle. Dirty and rusty inside. 
Normally staffs are nice but need more staffs in that size. Slow customer service.

hotel_name: The Standard, Bangkok Mahanakhon
title: Second stay reviewβ€
content:
Pros: Good location / Attractive hotel interior / Friendly staff / Excellent facilities

This is my second visit, and compared to my first visit, the observatory visit time had been changed from 7 pm. 
When I arrived at 6:55, I had to wait for 5 minutes, while other guests who arrived at 6:58 were allowed to enter the observatory right away. 
It was unpleasant for the staff to arbitrarily apply the observatory entry time to customers. 
During my first stay, it was possible to visit the indoor observatory on the 73rd or 74th floor, but this time it was inaccessible. 
However, since this is an additional service provided by the hotel, it did not have a significant impact on my overall evaluation of the hotel.

Bath salts were provided but were missing. 
I felt that around 50% of the guests were Chinese, 30% were Korean, and 20% were from other countries.

In conclusion, I am generally satisfied, but I do not plan to make a third visit.

hotel_name: λ” λΈ”λ μ¤ νΈν…” μ•¤ λ μ§€λμ¤ (The Bless Hotel & Residence)
title: Thank you, Bless Hotel staff!!β€
content:
When I stay in Bangkok, I think of this hotel as the first and second priority. 
When I visited in April this year, I was disappointed because it was different from visiting Bless Hotel before Corona. 

As a result of my visit again this time, I felt that many things have improved. 

1. a friendly staff.
2. a clean room condition.
3. The old swimming pool has also been improved. 

When I recently visited with my acquaintances in August, I was very satisfied with the hotel's modifications after knowing the customer's feedback. 

It is a hotel that I will think of as the first and second priority when I visit Bangkok next time.

title: Yes & noβ€
content:
Lobby smells like mildew.

Room is off the hook good.

They double booked my room so we had another guest open my door at midnight while we were sleeping & management would not comp is for the issue, lost sleep etcβ€¦resort is good but staff is lacking.

hotel_name: Anantara Koh Yao Yai Resort & Villas
title: Scam`β€
content: They will decline your booking till the card is charged twice, they will never tell you that their speed boat cost 12,500 i.e. half the stay amount. They will speak rudely on call. If you ask to cancel because of the high fee they will decline.

ν—λ¦¬μ°λ“λ‚ λ””νΌ, μ„ΌνΈλ΄λ§λ¦¬λ‚, λΉ…C λ¨λ‘ κ°€κΉμ›μ„ μΆ‹λ„¤μ”. ν—¬μ¤μ¥μ€ λΉ„κµμ  ν‘μ†ν•κ³  μμμ¥λ„ λ§μ΄ λ„“μ§€λ” μ•λ”μ μ€ κ°μ•ν•΄μ£Όμ‹λ©΄ μΆ‹μ„ λ“―ν•΄μ—¬!! λ„λ¬΄ μ μ‰¬λ‹¤κ°€μ” κ°μ‚¬ν•©λ‹λ‹¤!

The best thing was the friendliness of the staff.
I felt really treated well and I love they are always smiling and friendly. This is true of all employees here.
The second good thing is check-out policy and meal. Thanks to the 24-hour check-out policy, you can get to the airport on time without the need for a late check-out, and breakfast is generous until 4 p.m., so you can accommodate any schedule. Moreover, I wasn't expecting breakfast, but it was good. In particular, the softness of the French toast is truly the best^^
I think I will come again next time.
It's located between Beach Road and Second Road, so it's convenient to get around (of course, it's on the north side of the beach, but considering that it's not too far from the north beyond the Hard Rock Hotel(mean traffic) I think it's okay).
Bedding was also good, and air-conditioner was silently works. Room is a little bit dark but mood is the best.
It's nice to  the Hollywood, Differ, Central Marina, and Big C are all close by. 
The gym is small and the swimming pool is not very large. But I think this hotel is very nice to you. Thank you for all of staff of Payya.

hotel_name: Siam @ Siam Design Hotel Pattaya
title: Best cost efficient hotel in Pattayaβ€
content: For someone like me who doesn't enjoy beach activities, the location is great and Central Marina is nearby. If you need to go to Walking Street or the beach, you can use the Baht Bus. Although it is not the most up-to-date building and facility, it is a hotel in very good condition for the price and I am willing to visit again next time.

title: Arbour Hotel reviewβ€
content:
5 Stars Hotel
But the breakfast menu is simple
The SPA is a bit expensive and difficult to make a reservation
My room had a bit of a bad smell, It's on the 20th floor, but there are bugs flying around the balcony
The most inconvenient thing was,
Valet parking and small parking space need improvement
The most inconvenient thing is that you have to ask the front desk 30 minutes in advance to use the parked car
Other than that, it's a clean and decent hotel
